generation0.title: Who is Harry Potter?
generation0.passage:
Harry Potter is a young wizard who discovers he has magical powers on his 11th birthday.
He attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and becomes famous for surviving an attack by the dark wizard Voldemort when he was a baby.
Harry makes close friends like Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger, and together they face many magical adventures.
The story follows Harry as he grows up, learns magic, and fights against evil.

generation1.title: Life at Hogwarts
generation1.passage:
At Hogwarts, students are sorted into four houses: Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, and Slytherin.
Harry is sorted into Gryffindor, where he meets many of his friends.
Students attend classes like Potions, Defense Against the Dark Arts, and Transfiguration.
They learn spells, fly on broomsticks, and take magical exams.
Hogwarts is also full of secrets, including moving staircases and hidden rooms.

generation2.title: Harry's Magical World
generation2.passage:
Harry’s world includes many magical creatures like house-elves, hippogriffs, and goblins.
He also plays Quidditch, a popular sport on flying broomsticks.
Harry uses a wand to cast spells and carries an invisibility cloak that once belonged to his father.
The wizarding world also includes magical objects like the Marauder’s Map and the Mirror of Erised.
Throughout the series, Harry learns about bravery, friendship, and sacrifice.
